subject: Order not delivered yet
description_text:
Hello, i placed an order on the 19th October and paid for express shipping.
My order still hasn't arrived even though express said approx 4 days.
Could you check where my order is please?
Thankyou
Tim

conversations.body_text: Hi Tim,    We sincerely apologize that the logistics company mistakenly shipped your package by air to Sydney instead of Perth. Delivery from Sydney to Perth will take approximately 4 days. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and will refund the additional express shipping fee.

Hello, are there any further updates on this?

Is it possible for the delivery to be cancelled and the item to be
returned? I will go buy a different set of pedals as this is taking too
long. It is still showing as in Sydney...

Tim



On Thu, 30 Oct 2025, 6:02 pm service@simsonn.com,

Hi Tim,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have refunded the extra shipping charges for you. Your package is expected to arrive around the 6th.  http://www.pflogistics.com.au/tracking-result  NEXAU1029809679YQ
